posts.postText:
Offender name: [RnGG] THMN101
Offender's Steam ID: STEAM_0:1:32274181
What the Offender did: Arrested everyone but one person on the server
Were there any admins on at the time?: No
Proof:  http://i35.tinypic.com/2hcomtd.jpg 
 http://i37.tinypic.com/309hjs4.jpg
What proof is there of him actually arresting the people?

Second screenshot near the top, he said ":P" gets demoted then says "Oh well this server sucks anyways, bye" and leaves. And you can ask anyone on the server at that time. Only a guy named Spencer didnt get arrested (i was stuck in a pole when he arrested me)
i trust dum with stuff like this.

>> What proof is there of him actually arresting the people? 



I honestly doubt a admin of a server, Hell owner of one would lie about something like this, Also looking at the fact he said the server sucks, a complaint of someone getting random arrested, another complaining about justin, and so many people in jail.
Yeah, you can even ask GIT, who plays on the server all the time

>> Only a guy named Spencer didnt get arrested 

I am not at all surprised by this.
Maybe we should make it so it takes a minute after arresting someone to arrest again, cuz that's just gay. Everyone in that one cell is gonna get some people buttraped.

>>  Everyone in that one cell is gonna get some people buttraped. 

That means you, Yoko.
/joke

>> Maybe we should make it so it takes a minute after arresting someone to arrest again, cuz that's just gay. Everyone in that one cell is gonna get some people buttraped. 

Ehhh, some issues could occur with that. How about only 1 un-wanted person per a minute, and 3 wanted people.

>> >> Maybe we should make it so it takes a minute after arresting someone to arrest again, cuz that's just gay. Everyone in that one cell is gonna get some people buttraped. 

Ehhh, some issues could occur with that. How about only 1 un-wanted person per a minute, and 3 wanted people. 

Well considering the problem was random arrests, I don't see why wanted arrests would matter at all. 
But yeah, un-wanted should be limited; to prevent random arrests.

>> >> >> Maybe we should make it so it takes a minute after arresting someone to arrest again, cuz that's just gay. Everyone in that one cell is gonna get some people buttraped. 

Ehhh, some issues could occur with that. How about only 1 un-wanted person per a minute, and 3 wanted people. 

Well considering the problem was random arrests, I don't see why wanted arrests would matter at all. 
But yeah, un-wanted should be limited; to prevent random arrests. 

Wanted arrests are so that you can get by the unwanted arrests, so that you can want several people at a time if several people are breaking in. I know that sounds confusing 0.0
